message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm confident that's a fair price for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $16,000, which I believe is still a fair price considering the value of this product. Let's try to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $16,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $13,500 for the product, which I think is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go lower than $15,500. This is a high-quality product that will be worth every penny. Let's find a way to close this deal. I'm open to discussing further.

I appreciate your understanding of my budget constraints, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target as possible. I'd be willing to pay $14,200 for the product, which I think is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
